description: Retrieves information about all runs associated with the specified table.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database where the table resides.

nested_items.name: ColumnStatisticsTaskRuns
nested_items.description: A list of column statistics task runs.

nested_items.name: CustomerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: ColumnStatisticsTaskRunId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the particular column statistics task run.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database where the table resides.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table for which column statistics is generated.

nested_items.name: ColumnNameList
nested_items.description: A list of the column names. If none is supplied, all column names for the table will be used by default.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CatalogID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Data Catalog where the table resides. If none is supplied, the Amazon Web Services account ID is used by default.

nested_items.name: Role
nested_items.description: The IAM role that the service assumes to generate statistics.

nested_items.name: SampleSize
nested_items.description: The percentage of rows used to generate statistics. If none is supplied, the entire table will be used to generate stats.

nested_items.name: SecurityConfiguration
nested_items.description: Name of the security configuration that is used to encrypt CloudWatch logs for the column stats task run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfWorkers
nested_items.description: The number of workers used to generate column statistics. The job is preconfigured to autoscale up to 25 instances.

nested_items.name: WorkerType
nested_items.description: The type of workers being used for generating stats. The default is g.1x.

nested_items.name: ComputationType
nested_items.description: The type of column statistics computation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the task run.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that this task was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The last point in time when this task was modified.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the task.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the task.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message for the job.

nested_items.name: DPUSeconds
nested_items.description: The calculated DPU usage in seconds for all autoscaled workers.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if not all task runs have yet been returned.
